sql-query.sql: select distinct lookup_id,promo_id from pep_view_promo_criteria_rel where ( enterprise_type = ? OR enterprise_type = -9 ) AND ( liability_id = ? OR liability_id = '-' ) AND ( region_id = ? OR region_id = '-' ) AND ( contract_id = ? OR contract_id = '-' ) AND ( fan_id = ? OR fan_id = '-' ) AND ( account_id = ? OR account_id = '-' ) AND ( 'N' = ? OR ( 'Y' = ? AND ( ? >= mac OR mac = -9 ) ) )
